ImageView.android:text: E-Record is a Employee Record Management System application that record employee information . It helps you to easily record and store information of your employee. Basically this app made for a company or for business purposes. An employeee management system is a repository of all employee data . It allows you to store, managed and track all employee data. An online inventory of all employee.
